SELECT COUNT(o.ORGN_ID) number, kv.DICT_VALUE areas FROM qyjc_sy.qy_shop_info s LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.`qy_orgn_base_info` o ON o.orgn_id=s.orgn_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT DICT_KEY, DICT_VALUE FROM qyjc_sy.bfw_data_dict WHERE DICT_CODE = "ORGN_NATURE" ) kv ON o.ORGN_NATURE = kv.DICT_KEY WHERE s.IF_IDENTIFY = 'Y' AND s.pub_flag = 'Y' AND ( s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao.ADMIN_OGRN FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao ) OR s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao2.orgn FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao2 WHERE LOWER( ao2.admin_ogrn ) = 'sy00' )) AND o.PROVINCE <> '北京' GROUP BY kv.DICT_VALUE ORDER BY COUNT(o.ORGN_ID) DESC

SELECT COUNT( o.ORGN_ID ) number, o.DISTRICT areas FROM qyjc_sy.qy_shop_info s LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.`qy_orgn_base_info` o ON o.orgn_id=s.orgn_id WHERE s.IF_IDENTIFY = 'Y' AND s.pub_flag = 'Y' AND ( s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao.ADMIN_OGRN FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao ) OR s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao2.orgn FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao2 WHERE LOWER( ao2.admin_ogrn ) = 'sy00' )) AND o.PROVINCE <> '北京' GROUP BY o.DISTRICT ORDER BY COUNT( o.ORGN_ID ) DESC

SELECT COUNT( o.ORGN_ID ) number, IF(kv.DICT_VALUE IS NULL,'机构未填写',kv.DICT_VALUE) AS areas FROM qyjc_sy.qy_shop_info s LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.`qy_orgn_base_info` o ON o.orgn_id=s.orgn_id LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.qy_orgn_info_common c ON o.ORGN_ID = c.ORGN_ID LEFT JOIN( SELECT DICT_KEY, DICT_VALUE FROM `qyjc_sy`.bfw_data_dict WHERE DICT_CODE = "SERVICE_TYPE_QY" ) kv ON c.INDUSTRY_CATEGORY = kv.DICT_KEY WHERE s.IF_IDENTIFY = 'Y' AND s.pub_flag = 'Y' AND ( s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao.ADMIN_OGRN FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao ) OR s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao2.orgn FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao2 WHERE LOWER( ao2.admin_ogrn ) = 'sy00' )) AND o.PROVINCE <> '北京'
GROUP BY kv.DICT_VALUE ORDER BY COUNT( o.ORGN_ID ) DESC

SELECT count( o.ORGN_ID ) number, kv.DICT_VALUE areas FROM qyjc_sy.qy_shop_info s LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.`qy_orgn_base_info` o ON o.orgn_id=s.orgn_id LEFT JOIN qyjc_sy.qy_orgn_info_common c ON o.ORGN_ID = c.ORGN_ID LEFT JOIN( SELECT DICT_KEY, DICT_VALUE FROM bfw_data_dict WHERE DICT_CODE = "SERVICE_DOMAIN" AND DICT_LEVEL = 1 ) kv ON c.INDUSTRY_FIELD = kv.DICT_KEY WHERE s.IF_IDENTIFY = 'Y' AND s.pub_flag = 'Y' AND ( s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao.ADMIN_OGRN FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao ) OR s.ORGN_ID IN ( SELECT ao2.orgn FROM `lims-sy-1005`.admin_orgn ao2 WHERE lower( ao2.admin_ogrn ) = 'sy00' )) AND o.PROVINCE <> '北京' GROUP BY kv.DICT_VALUE ORDER BY count( o.ORGN_ID ) DESC
